meta.title: Wellsboro Area School District School Closure Information

meta.content: Wellsboro Area School District School Closure Information

div.h1: Wellsboro Area School District School Closure Information

h3.a: Middle School to Start Phase 3 -- Graded Work -- Monday, April 20

meta.div:
Attention parents and students of Rock L. Butler Middle School:
Beginning on Monday, April 20th, the Middle School will begin remote learning for all students. This means the optional and ungraded work that has been posted for the previous three weeks will switch to required and graded work for all students. Accessing the work will remain the same as it has been, using the grade level links on the Middle School’s website.
Please know our staff is here for you, if you have any questions or concerns, please call or email the teacher that has been assigned to be your child’s mentor and you will receive a prompt reply. We understand this is a challenging time and thank you for your patience and cooperation.

Two updates from the Wellsboro Area School District this week:
First, we will be continuing to provide free Grab and Go Lunches for our students until further notice on the following schedule: Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from noon-2:00pm and 4:30-5:30pm. Lunches can be picked up from either the Wellsboro Fire Hall Annex or the Nypum Drive entrance of the Truck-Lite parking lot.
Second, the Governor has ordered that all PA schools remain closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. Remote learning will continue through June 4th as per our revised school calendar. Please check your child’s school website to locate information on remote learning. There are assignments posted.
Please understand that we are unable to allow student to clear out their lockers currently. An announcement will be made when this will happen.
As always, this information will also be posted to our Facebook page and our website under school closure information.
Enjoy the Easter break, remote learning resumes on April 14th. Thank you for your cooperation during this unprecedented time. Happy Easter.

h3.a: Rock L. Butler Middle School Chromebook Pickup

meta.div:
Attention parents and guardians of Rock L. Butler Middle School Students.
Chromebooks will be distributed tomorrow (Tuesday, 4/7) at the Middle School for students that do not currently have access to a device at home. Again, please do not pick up your child’s Chromebook unless it is necessary for them to be able to access and complete the optional activities teachers are currently posting.
Please arrive during the designated time for your child’s grade. The times are as follows:
5th grade – 8:00 to 9:30
6th grade – 9:30 to 11:00
7th grade – 11:30 to 1:00
8th grade - 1:00 to 2:30
If you have children in multiple grades, we will accommodate you by giving you multiple laptops at the same time.
When you arrive at the middle school please drive to the backdoor. Please note that you will not be required or allowed to get out of your vehicle. Additionally, anyone handling your child’s Chromebook will be wearing appropriate protective gear.
For the safety of everyone involved, this will be the only day and time for Chromebook pickup.

div.span: We will be continuing to provide free Grab and Go Lunches for our students next week. The schedule will be Monday, Wednesday, and Thursday from noon-2:00pm and 4:30-6:00pm and can be picked up from either the Wellsboro Fire Hall Annex or the Nypum Drive entrance of the Truck-Lite parking lot. There will be no Friday pickups this week. We are adding an option for deliveries on Thursday for families that cannot get to pickup locations. If you would like a delivery, please email brett@wellsborovineyard.org or call 570-723-8463 by Tuesday. Thank you to all the employees and volunteers that help make the lunches possible!

meta.div: Wellsboro Area School District's Continuity of Education Plan is available here: WASD Continuity of Education Plan

br.div: As per Governor Wolf’s order today, Wellsboro Area School District will remain closed until further notice. Students will not be returning April 9th as previously announced. Students are encouraged to visit their school’s website for enrichment and review activities posted by their teachers starting today. There will be further updates coming.

meta.div:
A few announcements from the Wellsboro Area School District:
Beginning Monday, teachers will be posting structured enrichment and practice activities for students to each school’s website. Visit www.wellsborosd.org on Monday for links to everything. Parents also either have been or will be called to get specifics on Internet access or the need for materials to be sent home.
If your child receives Special Education, Gifted or Chapter 504 services, please be on the lookout for information being mailed home from our Special Education Department next week.
We will be continuing to provide free Grab and Go Lunches for our students next week. The schedule will be the same as this week, Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from noon-2:00pm and 4:30-6:00pm and can be picked up from either the Wellsboro Fire Hall Annex or the Nypum Drive entrance of the Truck-Lite parking lot.
Thank you!
